headers.subject: [tosdr:2894] Gittip: [Good] Terms found unlawful can be ignored

subject: Gittip: [Good] Terms found unlawful can be ignored
text:
Title: [Good] Terms found unlawful can be ignored
Topic: governance
Summary: Any term of the ToS found to be unenforceable is severed
Score: 100

> If any provision of these Terms shall be deemed unlawful, void or for any reason unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from these Terms and shall not affect the validity and enforceability of any remaining provisions.

Note: This is a part of the series of ratings as a part of gittip issue #1898.

https://github.com/gittip/www.gittip.com/issues/1898

References:

Gittip Terms of Service 

https://www.gittip.com/about/terms/

Gittip Privacy Policy

https://www.gittip.com/about/privacy/
